name: Dark Iron Sword

refinement_effect.refine_one: Upon causing an Overloaded, Superconduct, Electro-Charged, or an Electro-infused Swirl reaction, increases Base ATK by 20% for 12s.
refinement_effect.refine_two: Upon causing an Overloaded, Superconduct, Electro-Charged, or an Electro-infused Swirl reaction, increases Base ATK by 25% for 12s.
refinement_effect.refine_three: Upon causing an Overloaded, Superconduct, Electro-Charged, or an Electro-infused Swirl reaction, increases Base ATK by 30% for 12s.
refinement_effect.refine_four: Upon causing an Overloaded, Superconduct, Electro-Charged, or an Electro-infused Swirl reaction, increases Base ATK by 35% for 12s.
refinement_effect.refine_five: Upon causing an Overloaded, Superconduct, Electro-Charged, or an Electro-infused Swirl reaction, increases Base ATK by 40% for 12s.

description: A perfectly ordinary iron sword, just slightly darker than most.
